name: UIKitHelper
summary: UIKitHellper is a collection of UIKit classes that makes some common view behaviors easily to implement.
description: UIKitHellper is a collection of UIKit classes that makes some common view behaviors easily to implement, like tap background to hide keyboard, infinite scroll view, etc.
